programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if realtime audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o vibr.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1
kaverageamp init 500 kaveragefreq init 4 kvib vibr kaverageamp, kaveragefreq, 1 asig poscil .8, 220+kvib, 1 ;add vibrato outs asig, asig
endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore> f 1 0 16384 10 1 ;sine wave
i 1 0 10
e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
